Hanzi: 我最喜欢{1: select * from food_type ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 1: 1.name}是{3: select * from food where food.food_type_fk == 1.id ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 1}
English: My favorite {1: select * from food_type ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 1: 1.name} is {3: select * from food where food.food_type_fk == 1.id ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 1}
